front.title: BGP Monitoring Protocol (BMP) Statistics Types Extension

abstract.t: [RFC7854], [RFC8671] and [I-D.ietf-grow-bmp-bgp-rib-stats] define different BGP Monitoring Protocol (BMP) statistics message types to observe events that occur on a monitored router. This document defines some additional statistics type to monitor BMP Adj-RIB-In, Loc-RIB and Adj-RIB-Out Routing Information Bases (RIBs).
